Capability Description: Identifying and sourcing investment opportunities for Private Equity Firms
Process Description: Gathering and analyzing market data to identify promising sectors, emerging trends, and potential investment targets.
Sub-Process Description: outlines fund specific details like type,size,sector,geography,IRR,deal size
Data Entity:
1. Fund type
2.Fund Size
3. Geographical Focus
4. Sector Focus
5. Excluded Sectors
6. Investment Stage
7. Deal Size Range
8. Equity Stage Prefrence
9. FUnd return target (IRR)
10.Financial Criteria
11. Value creation Approach
12. Exit Preference
13. Exit Horizon

Capability Description: Identifying and sourcing investment opportunities for Private Equity Firms
Process Description: Gathering and analyzing market data to identify promising sectors, emerging trends, and potential investment targets.
Sub-Process Description: identify target country as per instructions given in fund mandate & given restrcitions.
Data Entity:
1.Macroeconomic fundamentals (GDP growth,Inflation %)
2.Political & regulatory environment (Stability index)
3.Currency & capital flow considerations (exchange rate)
4.Legal system & contract enforcement (rule of law index)
5.Market size & structure (urbanization %)
6.ESG & social considerations (social inclusion score) .
API:
1. Macroeconomic.API
2. Political & Reg. API
3. Capital flow.API
4. Legal System.API
5. Amrket size.API
6. ESG.API

Capability Description: Identifying and sourcing investment opportunities for Private Equity Firms
Process Description: Gathering and analyzing market data to identify promising sectors, emerging trends, and potential investment targets.
Sub-Process Description: identify target company in alignment with all the data points specified in fund mandate, country screening framework & company's screening framework
Data Entity:
1.Quality of Earnings and Financial Health (current ratio, audit opinions)
2.Company Financial Performance (net income,gross margin)
3.Industry Attractiveness (market growth rate,entry barriers)
4.Competitive Positioning (market share %,customer loyalty index)
5.Management Team & Governance (corporate governance rating,executive turnover rate %)
6.Operational Efficiency (asset turnover ratio,inventory turnover ratio)
7.Customer & Market Dynamics (sales cycle length days,customer retention rate %)
8.Product/Service Strength (service coverage area,product quality rating)
9.Exit Feasibility (time to exit years,ipo readiness score)
10.Scalability Potential (infrastructure flexibility,technology adaptability

Capability Description: Identifying and sourcing investment opportunities for Private Equity Firms
Process Description: Commercial, financial, tax, legal, operational, and ESG due diligence for the identified target company

Capability Description: Identifying and sourcing investment opportunities for Private Equity Firms
Process Description: Design transaction structures, negotiate economic and governance terms, and assess tax implications

Capability Description: Identifying and sourcing investment opportunities for Private Equity Firms
Process Description: Oversee negotiation of definitive agreements and coordinate closing processes
